publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Roger Barnes, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancery-lane, ouer against the Rolles,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: I.S., i.e. John Stephens.
A variant, probably earlier, has the author's name on title page.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Chancery-lane, ouer against the Rolles
